Well I‚Äôve been diagnosed with social anxiety disorder, but I feel like I‚Äôm very very sensitive to rejection and criticism and I feel inferior to others. Ending your life isn‚Äôt the answer. You owe it to yourself to have a second chance at life. You never know what the future holds and you could have a shot at living a happy life.
